citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
In the feed room, there were several expired medications. Medications must be administered within date to provide the
appropriate response and to protect the animals from disease. Facility must ensure medications administered are not
expired.
Facility disposed of all expired medication during the inspection.

Two Black-and-White Ruffed lemurs have an outdoor enclosure surrounded by a 6-foot perimeter fence that lacks an
adequate distance from the enclosure. The perimeter fence is only 30 inches away. A perimeter fence that is at least 6
feet high and 3 feet from the enclosure is needed with sufficient wire spacing to prevent unauthorized humans and other
animals from going through or under it. Not having an adequate perimeter fence is a safety risk because other animals
and/or people may contact them, and there is not adequate secondary containment. The facility shall ensure the outdoor
housing facilities for the lemurs are enclosed by an appropriate perimeter fence, or a variance, if appropriate, needs to be
obtained and can be requested from the Administrator/Regional Office.

Two Fenec fox and 1 bat-eared fox have an outdoor enclosure surrounded by a 6-foot perimeter fence that lacks an
adequate distance from the enclosure. The perimeter fence is only 14 inches away. A perimeter fence that is at least 6
feet high and 3 feet from the enclosure is needed with sufficient wire spacing to prevent unauthorized humans and other
animals from going through or under it. Not having an adequate perimeter fence is a safety risk because other animals
and/or people may contact them, and there is not adequate secondary containment. The facility shall ensure the outdoor
housing facilities for the fox are enclosed by an appropriate perimeter fence, or a variance, if appropriate, needs to be
obtained and can be requested from the Administrator/Regional Office.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
In the feed room, there were several expired medications. Medications must be administered within date to provide the 
appropriate response and to protect the animals from disease. Facility must ensure medications administered are not 
expired. 
Facility disposed of all expired medication during the inspection. 
3.78(d) 
   
Outdoor housing facilities. 
Two Black-and-White Ruffed lemurs have an outdoor enclosure surrounded by a 6-foot perimeter fence that lacks an 
adequate distance from the enclosure. The perimeter fence is only 30 inches away. A perimeter fence that is at least 6 
feet high and 3 feet from the enclosure is needed with sufficient wire spacing to prevent unauthorized humans and other 
animals from going through or under it. Not having an adequate perimeter fence is a safety risk because other animals 
and/or people may contact them, and there is not adequate secondary containment. The facility shall ensure the outdoor 
housing facilities for the lemurs are enclosed by an appropriate perimeter fence, or a variance, if appropriate, needs to be 
obtained and can be requested from the Administrator/Regional Office. 
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
Two Fenec fox and 1 bat-eared fox have an outdoor enclosure surrounded by a 6-foot perimeter fence that lacks an 
adequate distance from the enclosure. The perimeter fence is only 14 inches away. A perimeter fence that is at least 6 
feet high and 3 feet from the enclosure is needed with sufficient wire spacing to prevent unauthorized humans and other 
animals from going through or under it. Not having an adequate perimeter fence is a safety risk because other animals 
and/or people may contact them, and there is not adequate secondary containment. The facility shall ensure the outdoor 
housing facilities for the fox are enclosed by an appropriate perimeter fence, or a variance, if appropriate, needs to be 
obtained and can be requested from the Administrator/Regional Office. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

n
